mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS store_id, s.name AS store_name, s.address AS store_address, s.contact AS store_contact, s.is_affiliate, s.indoor_name, c.name AS category_name, m.name AS market_name FROM store s JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.id JOIN market m ON s.market_id = m.id

SELECT s.id AS store_id, s.name AS store_name, s.address AS store_address, s.contact AS store_contact, s.is_affiliate, s.indoor_name, c.name AS category_name, m.name AS market_name FROM store s JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.id JOIN market m ON s.market_id = m.id WHERE s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT s.id AS store_id, s.name AS store_name, s.address AS store_address, s.contact AS store_contact, s.is_affiliate, s.indoor_name, c.name AS category_name, m.name AS market_name FROM store s JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.id JOIN market m ON s.market_id = m.id WHERE s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND c.name = #{category}
SELECT day, DATE_FORMAT(open_time, '%H:%i') AS open_time, DATE_FORMAT(close_time, '%H:%i') AS close_time, is_closed FROM business_hour WHERE store_id = #{id}
SELECT id AS product_id, name AS product_name, price AS product_price FROM store_product WHERE store_id = #{id}
